{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20539v1", "title": "Randomstrasse101: Open Problems of 2024", "summary": "$\texttt{Randomstrasse101}$ is a blog dedicated to Open Problems in
Mathematics, with a focus on Probability Theory, Computation, Combinatorics,
Statistics, and related topics. This manuscript serves as a stable record of
the Open Problems posted in 2024, with the goal of easing academic referencing.
The blog can currently be accessed at $\texttt{randomstrasse101.math.ethz.ch}$.", "main_category": "math.PR", "categories": "math.PR,cs.IT,math.CO,math.IT,math.OC,math.ST,stat.TH", "published": "2025-04-29T08:32:59Z"}
